memberdef.name: EattsContinueWriteReq

briefdescription.para: Send a response to a pending write request. For use with ATT_RSP_PENDING.

simplesect.para: When a higher layer returns ATT_RSP_PENDING to an ATT write callback indicating the response status is pending, the higher layer must subsequently call this function with the status of the write request.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint8_t slot, uint16_t handle, uint8_t status, uint8_t *pData, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: EattsContinueReadReq

briefdescription.para: Send a response to a pending read request. For use with ATT_RSP_PENDING.

simplesect.para: When a higher layer returns ATT_RSP_PENDING to an ATT read callback indicating the response status is pending, the higher layer must subsequently call this function with the status of the read request.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Enhanced ATT Server.

simplesect.para: EattInit must be called after the ATT task is created and before calling EattsInit and/or EattcInit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Enhanced ATT Client.

simplesect.para: EattInit must be called after the ATT task is created and before calling EattsInit and/or EattcInit.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId)
memberdef.name: EattEstablishChannels

briefdescription.para: Begin requesting EATT L2CAP coc channels.

simplesect.para: When pEattCfg->initiateEatt is true, EattEstablishChannels is called automatically on DM_CONN_OPEN_IND. If pEattCfg->initiateEatt is false, EattEstablishChannels can be called by the application after DM_CONN_OPEN_IND to begin creating EATT channels.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId)
memberdef.name: EattGetNumChannelsInUse

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of open EATT channels on a given connection.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t roleBits)
memberdef.name: EattInit

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Enhanced ATT subsystem.

simplesect.para: EattInit must be called after the ATT task is created and before calling EattsInit and/or EattcInit.
